^ Math.SE ^

The most difficult branches of mathematics are the ones you neither like nor understand. And these differ from person to person. Most persons dislike maths in its entirety. Others are put off by this or that subdivision of the field; i.e., somebody can be very good at topology while hating geometry and calculus to death, or the other way around etc. Others on the other hand have no such qualms, and like almost all of these fields about equally. â€“ Lucian
